name: Osprey Katari 3 Pack - Men's
description: When you want to carry your water, and only your water. This low-profile pack has a little pocket and stretch side panels to carry a snack and your keys, and a large dedicated compartment for the water bladder. A magnet holds the bite valve out of the way when you're ripping down the trails.Foam back panel has ridges and a central channel to let air flow through your back while keeping the load close to your body.Shoulder straps and back panel have a mesh overlay for breathability and soft edges that are gentle on skin.Small zippered pocket holds a few essentials.Includes an Osprey Hydraulics LT 2.5L reservoir with a magnet that holds the bite valve on the shoulder strap.Rear loop for attaching a blinky light and reflective details enhance nighttime visibility.
